        var lightColorHex =             new Array("E8E8E8", "F2D798", "F4F4F4", "EFF4EC", "EDE8D5", "FFFFFF", "FFCC99");
        var darkColorHex =              new Array("C2C9D1", "C9AD6F", "E0E0E0", "C6CEC3", "CFCBB3", "E4E4E4", "CC9966");
        var controlBackgroundColorHex = new Array("E8E8E8", "F2D798", "F4F4F4", "EFF4EC", "EDE8D5", "FFFFFF", "FFCC99");
        var controlTextColorHex =       new Array("585B5E", "54110C", "888888", "888888", "615F54", "888888", "705438");
        var prefs = new _IG_Prefs();
        var colorScheme = prefs.getInt("colorScheme");

        var iframeCode = "<center><iframe height='270' width='240' frameborder='0' " +
          "scrolling='no' marginheight='0' marginwidth='0' " +
          "src='http://go.casaschi.net/pgn4web-puzzleoftheday?pgnData=&gameNum=&squareSize=30" +
          "&lightColorHex=" + lightColorHex[colorScheme] + 
          "&darkColorHex=" + darkColorHex[colorScheme] +
          "&controlBackgroundColorHex=" + controlBackgroundColorHex[colorScheme] +
          "&controlTextColorHex=" + controlTextColorHex[colorScheme] +
          "&frameBorderColorHex=none'>" +
          "iframe support required to display the pgn4web puzzle of the day" +
          "</iframe></center>";

        document.write(iframeCode);

      </script>
